quote: “The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.”
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: “I've had a lot of worries in my life, most of which never happened.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: “Most of us must learn to love people and use things rather than loving things and using people.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.”
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: “It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu.”
author: Andrea Hirata

quote: “When one has a grateful heart, life is so beautiful.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The best relationships in our lives are the best not because they have been the happiest ones, they are that way because they have stayed strong through the most tormentful of storms.”
author: Pandora Poikilos

quote: “The greatest ideas are the simplest.”
author: William Golding

quote: “We cannot be sure of having something to live for unless we are willing to die for it.”
author: Che Guevara

quote: “Know thyself.”
author: Socrates

quote: “Do you really want to be happy? You can begin by being appreciative of who you are and what you've got.”
author: Benjamin Hoff

quote: “They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.”
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: “I've been lucky. Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.”

quote: “The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends towards justice.”
author: Theodore Parker

quote: “I would rather make mistakes in kindness and compassion than work miracles in unkindness and hardness.”
author: Mother Teresa

author: Roy T. Bennett
